properties.name: ModuleSize
properties.summary: Module size in pixels.

properties.name: QuietZone
properties.summary: Quiet zone size in modules.

properties.name: TargetSizePx
properties.summary: Target output size in pixels (0 = disabled). When set, module size is adjusted to fit this target.

properties.name: TargetSizeIncludesQuietZone
properties.summary: When true, CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.TargetSizePx includes the quiet zone.

properties.name: ErrorCorrectionLevel
properties.summary: Optional error correction level override.

properties.name: TextEncoding
properties.summary: Optional text encoding override (when set, emits ECI for non-default encodings).

properties.name: IncludeEci
properties.summary: When true, emits ECI headers for non-default encodings.

properties.name: RespectPayloadDefaults
properties.summary: When true, payload defaults may override version/ECC settings.

properties.name: MinVersion
properties.summary: Minimum QR version (1..40).

properties.name: MaxVersion
properties.summary: Maximum QR version (1..40).

properties.name: ForceMask
properties.summary: Optional forced mask pattern (0..7).

properties.name: Foreground
properties.summary: Foreground color.

properties.name: Background
properties.summary: Background color.

properties.name: BackgroundGradient
properties.summary: Optional background gradient.

properties.name: BackgroundPattern
properties.summary: Optional pattern overlay for the QR background area.

properties.name: BackgroundSupersample
properties.summary: Background supersample factor for gradients/patterns (1 = disabled).

properties.name: Style
properties.summary: Style preset for PNG rendering.

properties.name: Art
properties.summary: High-level QR art options (theme + variant + intensity).

properties.name: ArtAutoTune
properties.summary: When true, applies scan-safety auto-tuning for art-heavy styles.

properties.name: ArtAutoTuneMinScore
properties.summary: Minimum safety score target (0..100) for art auto-tuning.

properties.name: ModuleShape
properties.summary: Overrides the module shape (when set).

properties.name: ModuleScale
properties.summary: Overrides the module scale (0.1..1.0).

properties.name: ModuleScaleMap
properties.summary: Overrides the module scale map.

properties.name: ModuleShapeMap
properties.summary: Overrides the module shape map.

properties.name: ModuleJitter
properties.summary: Overrides per-module jitter options.

properties.name: ProtectFunctionalPatterns
properties.summary: When true, keeps non-eye functional patterns at a stable, scan-friendly style.

properties.name: ProtectQuietZone
properties.summary: When true and a background pattern is enabled, preserves a clean quiet zone.

properties.name: ModuleCornerRadiusPx
properties.summary: Overrides the module corner radius in pixels.

properties.name: ForegroundGradient
properties.summary: Overrides the foreground gradient.

properties.name: ForegroundPalette
properties.summary: Overrides the foreground palette.

properties.name: ForegroundPattern
properties.summary: Overrides the foreground pattern overlay.

properties.name: ForegroundPaletteZones
properties.summary: Overrides palette zones.

properties.name: Canvas
properties.summary: Optional canvas options for sticker-style output.

properties.name: Debug
properties.summary: Optional debug overlay options (PNG only).

properties.name: Eyes
properties.summary: Overrides eye (finder) styling.

properties.name: LogoPng
properties.summary: Optional logo PNG bytes (embedded for PNG/SVG/HTML).

properties.name: LogoScale
properties.summary: Logo size relative to the QR area (excluding quiet zone).

properties.name: LogoPaddingPx
properties.summary: Padding around the logo in pixels.

properties.name: LogoDrawBackground
properties.summary: Whether to draw a background plate behind the logo. When enabled, the encoder may auto-bump the minimum version for scan safety.

properties.name: AutoBumpVersionForLogoBackground
properties.summary: When true, bumps CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.MinVersion to a safer minimum for logo background plates.

properties.name: LogoBackgroundMinVersion
properties.summary: Minimum version to use when a logo background plate is enabled (0 = disable auto bump).

properties.name: LogoBackground
properties.summary: Logo background color (defaults to QR background).

properties.name: LogoCornerRadiusPx
properties.summary: Logo background corner radius in pixels.

properties.name: JpegQuality
properties.summary: JPEG quality (1..100).

properties.name: WebpQuality
properties.summary: WebP quality (0..100). A value of 100 uses lossless VP8L.

properties.name: IcoSizes
properties.summary: ICO output sizes in pixels (1..256). Defaults to common icon sizes.

properties.name: IcoPreserveAspectRatio
properties.summary: When true, preserves aspect ratio and pads to square for ICO.

properties.name: HtmlEmailSafeTable
properties.summary: When true, renders HTML using email-safe tables.
